name: TI_2_1_3_11_Resource_Usage_System_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.3.11 Resource Usage System Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track resource usage event.
purpose: Capture resource usage event, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.11#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit usage of system resources (access, computational, storage, network) according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.11#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.11#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.11#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.11#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.11#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.11#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).
